name: Impulse Tracker Instrument
summary: Learn about .ITI files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Impulse Tracker is a free music tracker created by Jeffrey Lim and released in 1995. The music sequencing program allows you to create music by organizing notes in different channels as patterns.

You can choose the instruments (and their samples) to be played back according to specified notes by Impulse Tracker. The instruments you can choose from are saved in the ITI format, and users Impulse Tracker users can share them with each other.

instructions: You can open an ITI file with Impulse Tracker (Windows). However, the software is not actively developed and may not run on your operating system version. CocoModX (macOS) can also open ITI files but is discontinued.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
